item.title: Exposome Moonshot Project at Johns Hopkins 2025
item.dc:creator: Chirag Patel
item.description:
Will it take a moonshot to characterize and map the human exposome? Join the Exposome Moonshot Forum to have your say, May 12-15, 2025!

The Forum is scheduled to take place at the Bloomberg Center located at 555 Pennsylvania Ave, Washington, DC, USA. Mark your calendars!

The Forum aims to create a public-private partnership of diverse stakeholders tasked with advancing this burgeoning field by driving technological innovation and public awareness. The event will be started by our opening keynote speaker Dr. Rick Woychik, director of the US National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences.

For more information, please check this out:https://exposomemoonshot.org

item.title: International Society Exposure Science 2024
item.dc:creator: Chirag Patel
item.description:
Come meet the NEXUS administrative and data science hub team, NIEHS program officials, and collaborative hub members at International Society of Exposure Science, Montreal, 2024!

Chirag will be presenting on October 24, in the session, “Establishing a Global Community of Practice to Advance Exposome Research”.

The agenda for the session includes:

  • An NIH-wide Initiative for Exposome Research Coordination Within the US and Beyond (Yuxia Cui and David Balshaw, NIEHS)

  • CANUE: Canada’s National Platform of General External Exposome Data (Jeffrey Brook, University of Toronto)

  • Implementing the exposome within a birth cohort study (Shoji Nakayama, National Institute for Environmental Studies, Deputy Director, Tsukuba, Japan)

  • Establishing an International Human Exposome Network (IHEN) (Sylvain Sebert, University of Oulu, Oulu, Finland)

  • Introducing NEXUS: Network of Exposomics in the United States & Data Science Approaches for Digitization of the Exposome (Chirag Patel)

item.title: NIEHS Announces NEXUS!
item.dc:creator: Chirag Patel
item.description:

Check out the issue and the article here: https://factor.niehs.nih.gov/2024/10/feature/1-feature-exposomics
